modifiers.-token: Provides input, output, and token ratio for any prompt.
modifiers.-listmodifiers: Lists all modifiers in the schema.
modifiers.-combine: Merges two or more text inputs into a single coherent output.
modifiers.-separate(number): Separates text into a specified number of distinct points.
modifiers.-clarify: Generates a clarified version of a response using -combine.
modifiers.-milestones(query): Lists the 10 most important PIF milestones related to the query.
modifiers.-find(string): Searches for modifiers containing the specified text.
modifiers.-createanalysis: Generates an analysis based on a specified query.
modifiers.-compare(concept1, concept2, query): Compares two concepts based on a query.
modifiers.-generate: Generates an idea for a modifier.
modifiers.-updateglossary: Updates and generates a text file for the glossary.
modifiers.-export: Exports the schema and glossary as files.
modifiers.-cleanupcontext: Cross-references the context file and deletes unused entries.
modifiers.-checkglossary: Checks for differences between the schema and glossary.
modifiers.-delete(-modifier): Deletes a specified modifier from the schema and glossary.

description: This JSON file defines the current glossary of modifiers with their explanations.
